name: Launch of GDG Cloud Manila

venue.name: Google Philippines
venue.address_1: 38F Net Park Building, 4th Avenue, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig, 1634

description: Dear GDG Cloud Manila pioneers. We're launching GDG Cloud Manila with some tech talks, hands on demos, kumustahan, kainan, networking, etc. Sign up via Meetup.com (link coming soon!). Keep in touch for updates. For topics and speakers, see the poster or visit https://goo.gl/auV4pa Join our Facebook group: GDG Cloud Manila.

name: Cloud Study Jam at CSB (De La Salle College of Saint Benilde)

venue.name: De La Salle College of Saint Benilde

description:
• What we'll do
Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform, how to run containers on it and how to use the platform for data engineering. Attendees get free access to the labs ($70+ value). No need to create a Google Cloud Platform account or register with a credit card.
In this Study Jam, you will:

- Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
- To provide fun learning and networking opportunities for both professionals and students
- Get access to Qwiklabs.com, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
- Get Google-hosted badges like this for their online profiles, to show potential employers what they know about Cloud computing.

Agenda and schedule:
2:30 PM-3:00 PM: Registration
3:00 PM: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
4:30 PM: Break
5:00 PM: Intro to Docker or Scientific Data Processing lab
6:00 PM: Event ends

• What to bring
laptop, ID

• Important to know
- This event is FREE but slots are limited. To apply for a ticket you need to be WAITLISTED first (as seen in the upper-right of the page. Make sure that your FULL NAME on your profile is correct. Only confirmed participants (RSVPed Yes) can be accommodated.
- To those who were "RSVPed yes". If you are not sure attending the event, kindly change your status to "RSVPed No" so that we can give the slots to others. Slots are non-transferable.

For going participants: Make sure to accomplish this google form until TUESDAY FEB 27 12PM https://goo.gl/forms/yEv5wRqMTu8xgfJu2

description:

name: Introduction to Kubernetes  (with Cloud Study Jam)

venue.name: Amihan
venue.address_1: 3F Zuellig Building Makati Ave, cor. Paseo de Roxas

description:
Title: Running your First Kubernetes Cluster
With Emma Iwao, Google Developer Advocate

Kubernetes is an open source container management software used by thousands of users. This session will guide you through the basic architecture and step by step journey to launch your first cluster.

Bio:
Emma is a developer advocate for Google Cloud Platform, focusing on application developers' experience. Emma was a site reliability engineer at a mobile game company before coming to Google. Besides software engineering, she likes games, traveling, and eating delicious food.

Our venue is sponsored by our friends at Amihan Global Strategies! (https://amihan.net/)

6:30-7:00 pm - Networking + food and drinks
7:00-8:00 pm - Introduction to Kubernetes
8:00-9:00 pm - Q & A + hands-on session - Cloud Study Jam (bring your own laptop)

Venue: Amihan Office, 3rd Floor, Zuellig Building Makati Ave, cor. Paseo de Roxas · Makati City

name: Next '18 Extended Manila

venue.name: Loft Coworking Philippines
venue.address_2: Meralco Ave cor Julia Vargas Ave, Ortigas Center

description:
Time
11:00am to 11:30am Registration & Snacks
11:30am to 12:00pm Welcome + Highlights of Google Cloud Next Key Takeaways, Ruben Canlas
12:00pm to 12:45pm AI / TensorFlow, Ralph Regalado
12:45pm to 1:30pm CI on a Budget, Brian Tan Seng
1:30pm to 2:15pm BigQuery: How to Democratize Data in your Org, Iman Encarnacion
2:15pm to 3:00pm Lightning Talks (PechaKucha Style), Community
3:00pm to 3:30pm Using Google Cloud ML to manage inventory in Home Depot, Ruben Canlas
3:30pm to 3:45pm Closing. What's next for GDG Cloud Manila:
* Un-meetups
* More Qwiklabs
* Certification Study Groups
* Recognition Board

Share photos and highlights: #Next18Extended
how_to_find_us: Check out the Loft Coworking website for more details: https://www.loft.ph/

name: GDG Cloud Manila - Lean Coffee Meetup - December
description:
Last meetup to end the year. We will do a free-flowing chat and celebrate the end of the year with you. Bring questions and thoughts about cloud computing, AI, ML, DevOps, etc. Ruben and Brian will facilitate the talk using a Lean Coffee format.

Venue is at Commune in Poblacion, Makati (see map, below). As courtesy to the venue, we will ask attendees to order drinks and food during the session.

name: Cloud Study Jam - GCP Essentials
description:
Due to limited seating, kindly confirm/reconfirm attendance by Feb 19, 2:00 PM, so that we could give slots to waitlisted people.

For this meetup, please note the following.

1. Bring your own mobile internet connection.
2. Venue is at Unit 1905, Cityland Herrera Tower (see Map)
3. Limit is 25 participants.

Thanks.

——

What is a Study Jam?

Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers. These trainings will give you specific skill you can use for personal development or career advancement.

With a Cloud Study Jam, you will learn the fundamental
tools and capabilities of Google Cloud.

You will receive free access to our online labs. After the session, you can continue taking labs to earn Google Cloud badges.
how_to_find_us: Cityland Herrera is at the corner of V. Rufino and Valero Streets in Makati. A familiar landmark would be the PB Com Tower which marks the corner of Ayala Ave and V. Rufino St.

name: Intro to Machine Learning and Kubernetes (Cloud Study Jam 2)
description:
Cloud Study Jam 2: Introduction to Machine Learning & Kubernetes

These are hands-on introductory courses to Machine Learning (ML) and Kubernetes using the Google Cloud Platform (GCP). We will run them in parallel.

For ML:
1. Intro to SQL
2. BigQuery Qwik Start
3. Cloud ML Engine Qwik Start
4. Google Cloud Speech API
Details: http://bit.ly/sj-ml1

For Kubernetes:
1. Docker: create, run, and maintain docker
2. Kubernetes: create and deploy Kubernetes and scale them up
3. Orchestrating and managing Kubernetes deployments
Details: http://bit.ly/sj-k8s1

Please bring your own laptop and P100 to cover the minimum requirement of the venue. Venue will be in Makati, to be announced soon.

=========

Why join a Cloud Study Jam?

* Free access to hands-on labs, a $55+ value
* Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise
* No need to register with a credit card
* After the session, you can continue taking other labs to earn Google Cloud badges.
how_to_find_us:
36 Polaris corner Durban Streets,
Poblacion, Makati City, PH
For more details visit http://www.commune.ph/

name: GCP Essentials + Basic Machine Learning (Cloud Study Jam #3)
description:
GCP Essentials:
* Intro to the Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* Create virtual machines (VM)
* Run a web server in a VM
Overview: http://bit.ly/sj-essentials
-----

Machine Learning Intro:
* Intro to SQL
* BigQuery Qwik Start
* Cloud ML Engine Qwik Start
* Google Cloud Speech API
Overview: http://bit.ly/sj-ml1

-----
Why join the Cloud Study Jam?

* Get hands-on lab work FREE: a $55+ value
* Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise
* No need to register with a credit card
* Get certified and earn more: be ahead of the pack
* After the session, you can continue taking other labs to earn Google Cloud badges.

name: Postponed - Cloud Study Jam - Advanced: Kubernetes
description:
Postponed. To be rescheduled at another time.

We are gearing for the Cloud Study Jam at La Union so we will move this to another date in March. Watch this space for updates.

Apologies for any inconvenience.

Thanks!

name: Cloud Architecture + Cloud Essentials (Cloud Study Jam #5)
description:
This lab session is good for both beginners and intermediate skill levels. We will cover basic Cloud Architecture and start/continue Cloud Essentials. Those of you who started GCP Essentials can join us to continue and complete their badge, then move on to Cloud Architecture.

Cloud Architecture (Certification)

* Understand Access Controls with IAM
* Setup Load Balancers
* Getting Started with
* Cloud KMS
* Essential Cloud Networking
* Orchestrating with Kubernetes (and much more!)

Overview: http://bit.ly/sj-cert
Proceed to Lab: https://google.qwiklabs.com/quests/24

------
GCP Essentials:
Beginner:
* Intro to the Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* Create virtual machines (VM)
* Run a web server in a VM
* Continuing:
* Kubernetes
* Monitoring with Stackdriver

Overview: http://bit.ly/sj-essentials
Proceed to Lab: https://google.qwiklabs.com/quests/23

Please bring a laptop and P200 to cover food and WiFi.

name: Cloud Study Jam #9 - Women's Month
description:
We are wrapping up the Could Study Jams with a special session for Women's month, co-sponsored by the Women’s Inter-industry Network (WIN) Philippines. We've invited women in mid-career or those who want to shift to a career involving cloud technology. Allies from other gender preferences are welcome too!

Primary Topic: GCP Essentials
Secondary Topics: Basic ML, Cloud Architecture, etc

IMPORTANT: Bring a laptop and a mobile internet connection.

=======
Directions to the venue for the Cloud Study Jam: Women's Month.

The Venue is at HSBC Electronic Data Processing, Diliman Quezon City. In Google Maps, enter this code: M355+FJ Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The compound is inside UP Technohub. Check out the attached screenshot in this post.

Upon reaching UP Technohub, look for HSBC’s main gate or the gate facing Microtel Hotel. The guards will ask for an ID and sign the log book.

Please proceed to the reception area of the building across Starbucks. The guards will assist you on how to get to the auditorium.

1. VIA WAZE: Enter ‘ HSBC Electronic Data Processing’ on the search bar. From the result, choose ‘ HSBC Electronic Data Processing , Diliman, Quezon City.

2. VIA GRAB: Enter ‘HSBC Electronic Data Processing’ on the search bar. The result would show UP Ayala Land Technohub, Commonweath Ave, Diliman Quezon City and a list of Buildings with letters. From the list, choose Building C. Otherwise, look for HSBC – Electronic Data Processing Don Mariano Ave, Diliman Quezon City.

#CloudStudyJam
#GDGcloudmanila
how_to_find_us: The Venue is at HSBC Electronic Data Processing, Diliman Quezon City. In Google Maps, enter this code: M355+FJ Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The compound is inside UP Technohub. Check out the event details for detailed directions.
